ADVICE @ DISCHARGE :

        3. Diet - High fiber, low cholesterol, low sugar (no sugar if diabetic), fruits, vegetables (5 servings

        5. TARGETS * LDL<70mg/dl *BP - 120/80mmHg * Sugar Fasting - 100mg/dl Post Breakfast – 150mg/dl
